column5: Anybody know where I can get the bits and pieces for my lowrance? I need the little black plastic wheels with the teeth that adjust the angle of the transducer. Also the rubber washer.
Should be able to get them direct from Lowrance. 905-629-1614 give em a call.  919 Matheson Blvd. E. Mississauga.
I needed the same items . Went to Bass Pro and the gentleman at the electronics counter went out back and came back with  the items. No Charge. Now that was customer service!
thanks guys, I'll get on it
